body:
Yes, mem_pool_ is only for validation purpose. (maybe not necessary?)
Having an unordered_set aside from unordered_map is trying to save space.

We could: 1) remove the mem_pool_ and validation completely; or 2) if memory consumption is not of concern, we can remove the mem_pool_ and offload everything to mem_map_
